Title: Freeguild Marshal and Relic Envoy
Legend: Freeguild Marshals who lead from the front are perhaps the most heroic of all. The respect they have won from their warriors is stronger than any shield, and their Relic Envoys ensure their orders always get to where they are needed. When battlelines clash, their skill with sword, hammer and pistol swiftly becomes clear.
Intro: A Freeguild Marshal and Relic Envoy is armed with 1 of the following weapon options: Duelling Pistols and Silvered Shortsword; Master-forged Longsword; or Heirloom Warhammer.
